name: Wonder Trips
description:
It's time to discover different wonderlands and enjoy your own trips.
Have a Lot Of Fun by Riding, Racing, Para-sailing, and more...

Wonder Trips is designed to take you to different lands to enjoy many trips and activities.

You start by choosing your trip world.
In each world, enjoy four successive activities:
- You start with a beautiful landscape view around the land;
- Then you get your free time riding your mean of transportation (jetski boat, camel, etc.) to discover different monuments and parts of the environment; It's your time to discover hidden sides and places.
- You are lucky to participate in an exciting racing and to try your best to be the winner.
- By the end, get a fun time within a special activity and enjoy the wonderful view.

For more immersion, the game comes with native integration of the YAW VR motion simulator and the SRS telemetry, that could be enabled from Settings Menu.

New trips are coming soon...
